item.title: Static Program Analysis Reading Note: Introduction
item.description: Target of SPA Target 1: To answer any none-trivial questions of a program at given program point, e.g. Whether the judgement that x > const always true, i.e., invariant. What is the possible range of a number x? Target 2: To answer any questions of a program, e.g. How much memory could the program consume? Whether the program terminates on all legal inputs? They concerns both “yes-or-no” questions and more general questions.
